name: Deal Phoenix
tag_list: deal-of-the-day, tipping-point, discount, retail, deals, daily-deals
overview:
DealPhoenix, LLC is a members-only collective buying (or group buying) site that helps you and your friends or family try out new experiences at incredible everyday prices. Each and every day, we promote an exclusive deal from a local business looking to attract new customers. Whatâ€™s in it for you, you ask? Only 50% to 90% savings on the most exclusive restaurants, events, hotels, spas, and activities in and around Arizona and the Valley!

We focus on deals that bring people together socially and help you save money in the process. Need ideas to bring your friends together? Want to plan a romantic evening for that significant other, without breaking the bank? Looking for a local happy hour special? DealPhoenix is your source for the hottest deals at the most exclusive venues in Arizona. So go ahead and SIGN-UP for our daily deals, tell your friends and experience more of the Valley for less! Signing up is completely free!
